Developed REST API for the company’s existing Digipost service.

**Role**: [Full Stack Developer](__GHOST_URL__/tag/full-stack/), [System Architect](__GHOST_URL__/tag/system-architect/)  
**Team Size**: 2 Developers, 1 Project Manager, 2 Testers, 1 BA
